title: did you win probsteins t206 hof lot? Want to buy the Tinker

posts.post_title: did you win probsteins t206 hof lot? Want to buy the Tinker
posts.post_content:
If you are the winner of Probsteins t206 hof lot from last night Id love for a chance to buy the Sovereign Tinker. Pllease email me at [url]milkit1@gmail.com[/url]
thanks!
I can't find the completed listing now. What ended up being the final price on that lot?

[quote name="ZachS" post=1206371]I can't find the completed listing now. What ended up being the final price on that lot?[/QUOTE]
$2655 [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/370935791290?ssPageName=STRK:MEWAX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1423.l2649[/url]

I'll go ahead and jump aboard this train. If the winning bidder sees this and is looking to sell off some of the cards, I'd be interested in the Young portrait.

[url]bayouzach@bellsouth.net[/url]

A couple of really sexy cards in there. That Lajoie with bat is really gorgeous. There's a very small pencil mark on the back, but the registration, color and surface are beautiful. A very slight diamond cut, but that should grade nicely. The Eddie Collins and Chief Bender portraits are really nice, too. And the Evers port is quite nice; a very minor crease on the front. 

If a forum member bought this, and is selling the Eddie Collins, pm me please.
Sean, good luck with that Tinker.  :)
